casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Patrick RYAN 366A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2018 Marilyn G. Ozer, William F. Massengale, Attorneys at Law, for Ryan, Michael Patrick Kelvin Atkinson, Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant District Attorneys, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Locke Bell, Attorney at Law, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. William Stevenson, Assistant District Attorney, Bell, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of October 2018 by State of NC :

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of October 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
